name: Lemon Street
description:
The goal of Lemon Street is to make the
most money from selling cups of lemonade in a certain number of days. First, make a recipe, set a price, and then start selling! Customers will buy
depending on these factors:

Price

Reputation

Weather

appearance

Upgrade your stand to get even more
customers, and work for good reviews to
increase your reputation.  Spend your money wisely, and try not to go
bankrupt before time runs out. Good Luck!
